name: Utilities Support
description: Template for utilities cases including billing, outages, service requests, and meter readings

workflow_steps: 1. Verify customer identity using account number and service address
2. Determine utility type and service category
3. For outages: Check system status and provide estimated restoration time
4. For billing: Review account history and usage patterns
5. For service requests: Validate address and schedule appropriately
critical_notes: Emergency cases require immediate escalation to dispatch
Outage reports must include estimated restoration time
Billing disputes require account verification before adjustments
Service address validation is critical for field work scheduling

dependencies.billing_system: Required for account and billing inquiries
